title: Makerspace-Based Scientific Inquiry Project: Integrated Language Learning Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic scientific principles, ability to use simple digital tools, and English or foreign language reading proficiency
context.additional_context: Designing makerspace activities using smartphones, offering convergent education combining language learning and scientific inquiry.

learning_goals: Students design and implement scientific experiment models using smartphone-based makerspace tools.
Students write reports or presentation materials in English explaining scientific concepts acquired during the project process.
Students enhance scientific inquiry processes and creative design skills through team-based problem-solving activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
